remarks: Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
frins2g.1 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
frins2g.3 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
frins2g $p |- ( ( R Fr A /\ R Se A ) -> A. y e. A ph ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps y $.
